reviews.name: Do Kien Trung
reviews.review: Lovely place for family at weekend. Nice and simple decoration. The up side down ice cream is Dairy Queen's significant product. The taste is good. It is not too sweat so the children can enjoy it. The menu has few of choices, therefore the customer just can choose among 6 - 8 options. The special one, mango cream with steamed glutinous rice, is usually out of order. The staff is nice and well-trained üëçüëçüëç

reviews.name: Michael Leander
reviews.review: Decent mall. Good service at ground floor shops.  Great decor outside by entrance

reviews.name: Phuong Linh
reviews.review: I even find this mall more interesting than vincom plaza. On 3rd floor there are timezone playground (small but new an super clean as all kids have to wear socks and wash hands before entering play areas), indoor trampoline park and cgv. My kids enjoyed here very much. The mall is not big but enough to shop around

reviews.name: Binh Tri Tran
reviews.review: Very crowded especially at weekend. Good price. Located at city center.

reviews.name: Hwang Yun
reviews.review: If u need a break from the heat in Can Tho this is A good spot. There is also and all you can eat Korean BBQ for around $10usd on the top level. Good bang for your buck!!!

reviews.name: Connie Lin
reviews.review: Very delicious hot pot restaurant and staff there are so friendly. I can‚Äôt wait to visit again in the future.

reviews.name: D Sundance
reviews.review: Great mall with a selection of food places and cafes to choose from, a book/stationery store, clothes outlets, shoes, watches, electrical products, accessories, perfumes, and a large co op mart to get food and everyday essentials.

reviews.name: Sebastian R
reviews.review: Large shopping centre with food court. Shops range from supermarkets to coffee shops and book shops.

reviews.name: Hoai Nam Le
reviews.review: Parking service is not very convenient. Good variety of choise. Place for entertainment for families and friends

reviews.name: Dennis Nguyen
reviews.review: Good place to do some shopping..price are fix...dont have to trry to negotiate the price..good for travelers

reviews.name: The Green Dragon - R·ªìng Xanh
reviews.review: A really nice cinema with kind and friendly staff, the place was modern and clean with a vintage movie aesthetic, for the paintings on the wall on your way to the screens, the cinema screen overall was Good, and I liked how they have the Love box option at the top of the screen for couples, it was nice to sit with your partner, while you watched the film. Overall a great cinema to visit.

reviews.name: Mark Wilber (LoudMusic)
reviews.review: This is the main shopping mall in town. They have a food court upstairs and a nice movie theater on the top floor. You can also find Western style pizza restaurants and other things from Western cuisine on the food court floor. Also there's a kids area up stairs where they can play in a ball pit and rent kids activities.

reviews.name: griizzlerhops
reviews.review: Theres an Okay selection of food, there isnt much vietnamese food tho which is okay. My only complaint is the parking which is God awful, it's hard to park in a tiny space available. The Arcade,CGV,Kids play area, and trampoline park in the top floor is what makes this mall real cool. Had a great time here, Shopping is okay but the floor with all the play Features is what takes the cake. Had a great time here.

reviews.name: john ‚ÄúOptionworld 2000‚Äù smith
reviews.review: Clean, fun and safe. But it is only servicing any foods from other countries but Vietnamese. Some Western foods are together with rice for customer. For example, Korean or Japanese buffers, and fried chicken or hamburger with choices in rice. Places for children, women and business outfits. Market stuff for everything to everyone. Highly recomended, from shopping to household things, as well as different foods for unique tasks, looks and funs. Thus, best choices in diffirent cultures, foods and travels.

reviews.name: Kris Taylor
reviews.review: Great for coop shopping, sells everything

reviews.name: Nh∆∞ V√µ
reviews.review: A non- luxury mall with many stores for foods, clothes, restaurants and a cinema. There is also a beer club in the first floor. The supermarket market can be very crowded and it's a long queue for check out in peak time.

reviews.name: Kim Ng
reviews.review:
Mall √† 3 √©tages : ground level with food market, several stands for cosmetics, luggages, shoes and clothes.
The 1st floor is dedicated to clothes and the upper level of the market (essentially dishes, more clothes, detergents, soaps...).
The 2nd floor has restaurants, buffets, a Jollibee and Lotteria (fried chicken fast foods), a Tocotoco (bubbleteas) and a bookstore.
The last floor has a cinema.

If you buy stuffs inside, you can have them delivered at your place.

reviews.name: Nicolas Devos
reviews.review: Very good Japanese food

reviews.name: Nghiem Dang
reviews.review: Nice place for a night walk

reviews.name: Th√°i H√≤a Trung
reviews.review: Good place for general shopping and other activities as reading books, playing games, watching movies, various of food and beverage options.  There are minor issues as the walkways around the places are not well designed, stores so far don't have good marketing strategies so stores closing and new one opening are common here.

reviews.name: Robert Chase
reviews.review: Very nice shopping center.  Has some good eateries as well.  Kids loved Jump and running around on the trampolines

reviews.name: John B
reviews.review: An air-conditioned oasis in the heart of Can Tho city. Sense City mall has plenty of shopping options where you can pick up supplies you might be missing from home plus a good food court on the the 3rd floor.

reviews.name: Trunglong Huynh
reviews.review: Sense city is a center to shoping. It contain co.opmart - a supermarket with many things and price is low or normal. In another part, it contain many showrooms and stores sell jewelries, clothers,  sneakers and sport tools, beer, coffee and drinks,... CGV cinema in the third floor of this building.

reviews.name: Kha Huynh

reviews.name: Dam Tran Thanh

reviews.name: Hung Ngo

reviews.name: Ho√†ng Th·∫°ch Nguy·ªÖn
reviews.review: Sense City Can Tho, centrally located, is the leading shopping and entertainment destination in the Mekong Delta. This center stands out with a modern space, diverse products from famous brands, meeting all shopping needs. Rich entertainment area with CGV cinema, children's play area, and electronic games. Diverse food court with dishes from many regions. Spacious parking lot, guaranteed security, and clean space are outstanding amenities. Sense City Can Tho is not only a shopping place but also an ideal destination for the whole family.

reviews.name: H·ªèi ƒê√†o
reviews.review: The shopping center here is very nice for eating, drinking, shopping and entertainmentü´∂‚ù§Ô∏è ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: Long Ho√†ng Ch√¢u
reviews.review: Worthy for a shopping mall in the heart of the city, with full services, supermarket, movie theater, food, cafe, parking lot, and weekend activities.

reviews.name: Ph∆∞∆°ng L√™
reviews.review: Miniso is having a program with the same price of 20, 50, 100k to have a lot of sale items, very okyla. New products are constantly updated

reviews.name: ƒê√†o ƒê·ª©c Ph√∫
reviews.review: Communicate with charmant suite hotel.

reviews.name: Xuyen Ngo
reviews.review: Sence City is the most convenient, right in the center near the school and hospital station, has 4 floors, prices are always competitive, clothes, food, shoes, fruit stalls are always full of variety, new products, Fresh and delicious, the food stalls during the day are quite ok, there are quite a lot of promotional items, in Can Tho there is a coopmart which makes it easiest to buy consumer goods, the parking lot is not too far!

reviews.name: Ng·ªçc Th·∫£o B√°ch
reviews.review:
Sense City Can Tho Commercial Center opened on January 20, 2014, invested and built by Saigon Can Tho Trading Company Limited - a joint venture between Saigon Co.op, SCID and C.T.C with large scale. an area of over 22,000 m2 including 04 shopping and entertainment floors and 01 basement parking area with an area of 3,500 m2.

Sense City Can Tho Shopping Center integrates a variety of products and services in a modern shopping space, harmoniously arranged among the categories of fashion, cosmetics, jewelry, accessories, and furniture. family use, entertainment area and multi-regional Foodcourt dining area.

In particular, the appearance of famous domestic and foreign brands present for the first time in Can Tho and the entertainment complex for families, young people, and office workers with over 4,000 m2 for Games/Bowling is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment, a children's play area with many attractive games along with 6 international standard 2D & 3D cinemas, the first time in the Delta. Cuu Long of the CGV (Megastar) group, Sense City Can Tho Commercial Center will help customers comfortably "Enjoy shopping emotions" and have relaxing moments and interesting shopping experiences.

Ps: What I don't like most here is P. It can be said that there is no spacious parking lot, it's too narrow...

reviews.name: Huy Tr·∫ßn
reviews.review:
Huge supermarket with all kinds of items, including food, accessories, shoes, sandals, jewelry, pharmaceuticals.... from 15k to high-end. You can almost buy anything here.
The ground floor has the most mixed stores in this supermarket, selling food, ice cream, jewelry, shoes, sandals, accessories, pharmaceuticals and the supermarket's general food department.
Up on the 2nd floor, everything is much more orderly as there are only clothes sold from retail stores and a section of the supermarket selling household appliances and clothes.
Going to the 3rd floor is a culinary paradise when there are many restaurants here such as milk tea, fried chicken, pizza, grilled dishes, hot pot... There is also a bookstore and a play area for children. and 1 more gym.
On the 4th floor is the electronic card game area for adults and the CGV cinema.
The toilet here is always clean, airy and fragrant, as if I had just finished going to the toilet and a janitor would rush in to clean it immediately, so extremely clean and very satisfied.
Give the supermarket 5* for satisfaction.

reviews.name: U·ªëng Th√≠ch ƒÇn
reviews.review:
HOT POT, GRILLED BUFFET AKA HOUSE

- Menu has 3 prices 199, 259, 309
- Go for 4 for 3 for menus 259 and 309, free 1 hot pot and FREE unlimited Pepsi 7up. (Mon - Fri)
- Menu with more than 30 fresh, on-line dishes and desserts
- Book in advance and get 10% off
- Open: 10am - 10pm
- Address: Sense City 2nd floor

reviews.name: Loan Le
reviews.review: Watch a good ghost movie tonight

reviews.name: 9.Ng.T·∫•n ƒê·∫°t PHCN5
reviews.review: The cinema's regulation is that if you want to change tickets, you must change them 1 hour in advance. Our group booked at 5:15 p.m., 1 hour before that, the sun was still hot. At 4:30 p.m., heavy rain flooded the street. It rained until 6:00 p.m., we asked to reschedule but they didn't sympathize with us. We couldn't predict the weather like before. Money wasn't easy to earn, but the theater still didn't sympathize with us. It's a bit sad. When I went to Lotte, the staff actively helped us exchange our tickets. This is just expressing our feelings today, the rest is fine.

reviews.name: Linh Kona Life
reviews.review: Located in a central location for easy transportation

reviews.name: Nghi ƒë·∫πp G√°i
reviews.review: It's quite okay, the things in here are expensive, but the service is -1 ‚≠êbecause it's expensive ;))

reviews.name: Hot Hit Cover
reviews.review:
Re-evaluate after many years.
Yesterday, 11/11/21, I didn't go to work (Baemin shipper), but I wore work clothes and was chased away and wouldn't let me in. Even if I took off my Baemin helmet and jacket, I wouldn't be allowed in. I explained. I went to Lock & Lock to buy a rice cooker but it didn't work. There was a loud exchange of words, then I walked out and heard a few people at the employee's door telling each other "it's okay" (like no need). guest), myself I had to go to Lock & Lock at Vincom to bring this rice cooker home. Too disrespectful of shippers, style doesn't need customers.

reviews.name: Nguy·ªÖn Thanh ƒêi·ªÅn - YHCT
reviews.review: The place has beautiful Tet decorations, rich goods, and free car parking if you make a purchase

reviews.name: Lan thao Nguyen
reviews.review: Beautifully and luxuriously presented. Fresh food, enthusiastic service. During peak hours such as noon, office workers who come over to eat should have food delivered promptly so they can return to work quickly at noon.

reviews.name: Tr√≠ Nguy·ªÖn Thi·ªán
reviews.review:
Located on Hoa Binh Avenue, center of Can Tho City. Supermarkets, commercial centers, cuisine, entertainment... very convenient for shopping, entertainment...

The minus point is that there is little parking space. Now there is a 9-story smart parking lot next door, but you have to walk and pay a fee.

reviews.name: D M
reviews.review: It's convenient because there's a fairly large Coop in the center. There's a movie theater, an arcade (mostly Japanese equipment), and a small food court, but it's more fun to go out for food or eat cheap side dishes at Coop.

reviews.name: Nancy travelwith
reviews.review:
I must say that the center here is a place associated with the childhood of the 9x generation like me and many others. From the time of Tan An school, Coopmart was built and then expanded into Sense city.
‚úÖ Convenient location, right in the city center.
‚úÖ There is parking above and below the basement.
‚úÖ Coop supermarket's prices are quite good and there is a truck to bring the goods back if you buy enough of the bill (200,000 should be). Points included.
‚úÖ The food is because I've been working far away for 7 years. Sometimes when I come back, I eat company pizza, sometimes eat King BBQ, and sometimes eat Lotte, I see a variety of food brands. Comfortable, spacious seating
‚ùåHowever, I have additional comments because the children's game area upstairs is quite small. It seemed like there was one before but it was eliminated. There's no one on duty for the games outside, so if you want to buy a card, go to the children's play area that sells tickets there and buy it (Tet 2024). I think the center is quite large so it brings more fun games for children, making it more convenient for families.
‚ùóÔ∏èIn addition, the parking lot here is only for customers using the center's services, which is completely reasonable. Avoid foreign customers sending you nothing. But at 10:00 p.m. supermarkets and shops close, except for movie theaters that are open. However, I watched the show until nearly 12:00 pm on March 7, 2024. I forgot to put the movie ticket in the trash and had to pay 5 thousand. Ok, 5 or 10 thousand to park the car is no problem, but when guests come in and out at almost 12 o'clock at night and don't watch a movie, what are they doing there? All the doors are closed and having to collect movie tickets to believe it is a bit unreasonable, while guests go down by elevator straight to the basement. In case outside customers come in to send in for free, they come in from outside, they can't go through the inside route and they can't come out at the same time as the movie ends üòÖüòÖ
So if this is done well, you should let the security guards take the time of the last slot that day, to avoid charging them extra parking fees.

Hope Sense city will develop strongly and provide better service in the future ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.name: Trang Nguyen Thi Thuy
reviews.review:
Coop mart sells super expensive. In my impression, coop sells at very reasonable prices. But the two times I visited, I found it extremely expensive. I take the example of Omachi cup noodles that I bought at go for 9k2 at coop and sold for 11k4. Oltr 1 cup of noodles has a price difference of up to 2k2, not only omachi, hoon hoc or other dishes also have a big difference.
Furthermore, the parking attendant still had a very good attitude. The first time I came here because I couldn't choose the dish I wanted and was charged parking fees, so that's ok. The second time I came to buy things, I still asked her to give me 2k. When I asked the teacher if I was buying anything, the goods were packed in the car, she said when I bought the goods I would give her a receipt, not if she saw the bundle and didn't collect money! Hello? So why didn't you ask for a bill in the first place instead of asking for 2k? You have to say your rules, but if you don't tell them, how will we know?
In general, the collection of parking fees is not friendly and is also expensive, so I don't dare to visit.
